channel.title: Getting Full Range working... Any1 wanna help?
channel.description:
Well I got skillcape emotes working for HBG-Scape V4 (yea, released V3 yesterday and am hard at work on V4 for you guys) and have to say, the emotes I chose OWN lol...
Also added a firecape emote...
Changed smithing tab to emotes tab, you can still smith by using ::smith...
Adding a ::commands command for a list of ALL commands...
But now I need Full working Range...
That and changing around some teles and adding new pk areas, will be the work and V4 will ve ready, so HOW EXACTLY DO I GET RANGE WORKING?
I need either a tut or some1 helping me to make it hit from a distance, and I need to know where to add the gfx for each hit... thats all I have left really...
Already have a new home area chosen and designed.... Well jsut tell me how I get that to hit from a distance and were ready....

item.title: Getting Full Range working... Any1 wanna help?
item.dc:creator: @candy candy
item.description:
@candy wrote:

what do u use for adding commands…?

Read full topic
item.source: Getting Full Range working... Any1 wanna help?
